website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight, supportive, and comfortable. These are the top qualities of the Koven hiking sneakers that make them ideal for day hiking in the summer. This stylish shoe from KEEN has also stunned hikers and casual wearers alike for being highly durable. Even with a few misses on the laces, this shoe has gotten amazing feedback, overall. Aside from hiking, you can use it for everyday work too.
pros: The KEEN Koven hiking shoe has impressed lots of people for being extremely comfortable
Customers love that this trail-centric shoe has zero break-in time
Despite being robust, this shoe has the look and feel of a sneaker, according to some expert reviews for KEEN Koven
Several users have given it five-stars for its superior traction
This shoe also gets high marks for having quite a roomy toe box
Plenty of verified buyers say it’s perfect for those who have slightly wide feet
Many people swear by its durable construction that can be used for hiking as well as everyday work
cons: The KEEN Koven could use another pair of eyelets further back from the top for a more secure fit, according to a few reviewers

customer_reviews.title: Felt cheap and poorly designed — didn't fit right
customer_reviews.text: These definitely were too small and narrow in my normal size, so I returned them. But I didn't exchange them for another pair because they had a cheap plastic-y feel to them that I have not ever experienced with the many other pairs of Keen boots, shoes, and sandals I have owned over the years. They felt cheaply made (and I say this as a big fan of Keen footwear overall) and poorly designed — they didn't offer much ankle support and kept rolling inwards. Didn't work for me at all.
customer_reviews.author: maxl31

customer_reviews.title: The best I've ever purchased.
customer_reviews.text: I've had a lot of issues with sore feet and even had planter fasciitis My sister told me to try Keen shoes. To be honest I didn't expect much when it came to helping with my foot pain. In the last 2 years I bet I have not worn "non-Keen" shoes ten times. I am absolutely SOLD on Keen. I just bought 3 different styles. But ALL are Keen. I don't know what they do, but the difference in my feet are unmistakable. I love Keen!
customer_reviews.author: Dlaindy

customer_reviews.title: Keen gets it right
customer_reviews.text: I am a Land Surveyor and I work in construction, I bought these boots for work. So far they are comfy and keep my feet dry. Trekked through the mud today and walked about the city streets in comfort and ease. These boots are not too heavy but rugged enough to get the job done, I don't feel like I have cinder blocks at the end of my legs but I know there's something there. This is my second pair of Keen boots, the quality is good and the wrap around rubber "nub" that covers the toes is great for when I'm working in a kneeling position. I highly recommend these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Nice boot.
customer_reviews.text: A little narrow in the toe box for me. Lugged soles great in dirt/rock, but a bit slippery on ice. Seem very well made and warm down to 10 deg. F (haven't tried lower). Really nice well made boot, just not perfect fit for my foot anatomy. Excellent value. I don't thing I have fully broken them in yet. I am expecting a little more stretch and better fit in the toes soon.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Keens.  Great Boot!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son. He has orthotic inserts and Keens has removable insoles. So the arch support may or may not be right. If you have arch issues, perhaps having something specific for you would be best. And if you do have your own arch supports, again, Keen's insoles come out. Great construction and keeps feet warm and dry. We pair the shoes with Merino wool socks to be sure.
customer_reviews.author: RJ Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of hikers.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe the best day hikers I have ever bought. Light and sturdy, good for all terrain. Water proof, without making your feet sweat. Great treads, don't get bogged down with mud. Order 1/2 size larger for perfect fit. Thanks for the great price and fast shipment.
customer_reviews.author: SJF1

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great,warm,waterproof and comfortable! Just wore these for the first time today in a driving rain walking a 10 mile postal route and they are just about perfect. If the arch support was better I would have given them 5 stars.I will probably change the insoles after they are broken in. Say 4-5 more days in them. Great WATERPROOF shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Craig the mailman

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I got these shoes for my husband for Christmas. Ordered his typical size and they fit great. Good quality, they keep his feet warm enough for light to moderate winter outdoor activities in interior Alaska. He loves them and wears them every chance he gets. They look very nice. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Alaskamom86

customer_reviews.title: This is my second pair KEEN hiking shoes and like my first pair they don't disappoint me they're very ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair KEEN hiking shoes and like my first pair they don't disappoint me they're very comfortable I wear a 10.5 EEE and purchased a size 11E these Chinese shoes fit is a little more snug than the ones made in the us. I rated these shoes with 4 stars because they"re made in china my last pair were made in the US. Other than that they're great.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Crossan Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable I have ever owned,I couldn’t possibly be happier
customer_reviews.author: William marston

customer_reviews.title: Those with wide feet will like these. I've been wearing them at work to ...
customer_reviews.text: These boots fit well. A bit stiff out the box, however they are constructed well. Those with wide feet will like these . I've been wearing them at work to break them in. So far, I find the stability superb. They keep my feet dry and they seem to breathe well. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Felix

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots!!!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable boots - light weight and warm. No break in time needed. They don't feel clunky like other boots but are much more durable than a sneaker. Previous boots were some Montrails and Asolos before that. These feel like feathers compared to those boots. Going on a long hike this weekend and will see how the ankle support will be - concerned about them being a "mid". This is the only reason why I give them a four stars instead of five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip D

customer_reviews.title: The only reason I posted that they are comfortable for a couple hours is that My husband only ...
customer_reviews.text: Any Keen product we've ever purchased has been top quality. The only reason I posted that they are comfortable for a couple hours is that My husband only wears them when he goes walking. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking boot!
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable boot and very nice looking! Keen's official site suggests going up 1/2 size because they run small. I usually wear 9.5 but bought size 10 and I'm glad I did. Even have room for another pair of socks for those really cold days. If I run I to any issues I'll report them here.
customer_reviews.author: anne

customer_reviews.title: Not foot friendly.
customer_reviews.text: Very warm and waterproof but uncomfortable. They were unyielding and hurt my feet which I found unusual for Keen products. I had to return them but amazon was great about that.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Adams

customer_reviews.title: Like
customer_reviews.text: The Keen koven polar boot is a very well made boot. I read other reviews and notices they were talking about sizes being off, so I went to keens website and they suggested to purchase a half size bigger, witch worked out perfect. The boot is warm and dry for Wisconsin weather. I like the look and feel of the boot.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Spranger

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe. Wore them all day right out of ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. Wore them all day right out of the box with none of the problems of trying to break in new boots. No stiffness or rubbing on the ankles and they were very comfortable all day. Iwork outside in the elements and these boots kept my feet dry and warm. The only reason I gave them 4 stars and not 5 is they tend to lean inwards a little while walking.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves these boots. We hunt and hike ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these boots. We hunt and hike a lot and he is hard to please when it comes to boots, first pair of keens....definitely not the last
customer_reviews.author: Karleigh

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for everyday outside use in cold and wet ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for everyday outside use in cold and wet weather. I'm a Fedex guy and I use heavy duty snow boots for very cold weather and heavy snow. I wanted these for an in-between shoe and they are perfect. Quality is great. I have been using them often since November and still no peeling off of the soles and no seems ripping off. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: L. R. Nava

customer_reviews.title: the best shoe for the money
customer_reviews.text: I've had many pair of Keen hikers. They are, by far, the best shoe for the money. These are insulated so perfect for cold weather use.
customer_reviews.author: David M Christensen

customer_reviews.title: I have bought Keens boots before with no problem about ...
customer_reviews.text: I have bought Keens boots before with no problem about the fit. These ran narrow and tight on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Shapoval

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of the styling or the fit. Just wore them around the house before sending them back. The gray was too light and the boot seemed to lean to the inside with each step.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The boots are comfortable but have terrible traction and are not water proof.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoes, not sure about quality as I have only had them a week.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied customer!
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfectly, great quality, and look and feel fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: M&W3

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable tough and well made
customer_reviews.text: My hubby is a huge hiker and loves to go where no one else has gone before. He is extremely rough on shoes and goes through several pairs a year. He's had a few keen sandals before that have held up well so I decided to give these boots a try. The day they arrived he had to go test them out. He was gone for 5or 6 hours and said that they were extremely comfortable and his feet weren't sore at all after the first use. He's since gone a few times and they are holding up nicely with very little wear. The pictures are of about 12-15 hours of rock climbing, cactus stomping use.
customer_reviews.author: bbb625

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Boot
customer_reviews.text: These boots are fantastic. I use them for hiking with my dog in colder months. Very comfortable, fit true to size and no break in is really needed. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Maria & Eric

customer_reviews.title: Only waterproof except when rain falls light enough to evaporate quickly.
customer_reviews.text: "fit as expected" because was recommended I go up a half-size. Comfortable and light, soles are hard and potentially dangerous on smooth, hard surfaces when wet. Just discovered that when walking on wet pavement where water is high enough to reach the upper portion, leakage was experienced immediately, so perhaps only appropriate for snow, except they are not warm in even 30° conditions. My Kamik Habitants w/ the same amount of thinsulate were very warm (however, the hard 'tpu' lower portion of those cracked after 10 mos. semi-regular use + developed holes in the lowest portion of the sole: now those are like a sponge). Will attempt to return these after about a month's use. Keen Dry "isn't".
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit. Went a size large
customer_reviews.text: After trying several North Face and Merrell boots, there were the icing on the cake. Perfect fit. Went a size large,14, and probably could have gotten away with my standard shoe size, 13, but they still feel great with thick socks. Feet are warm and happy in Chicago winter.
customer_reviews.author: Zach M.

customer_reviews.title: I inserted a liner and now things are better. Will be taking them with me when we ...
customer_reviews.text: The first time I hiked with them the bottom of my left foot was sore. I inserted a liner and now things are better. Will be taking them with me when we go to Iceland for 7 days.
customer_reviews.author: Judi Nassif

customer_reviews.title: True to Size, Happy Camper (literally and figuratively)
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with this vegan flavored boot; fit wonderfully, no funky aches or what have you. Looking forward to putting it through the paces during a trip to Arizona/Utah next month :-) . . .
customer_reviews.author: mike.r.reiss

customer_reviews.title: These boots were comfortable right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: These boots were comfortable right out of the box. I wore them for the first time yesterday on a 6 mile hike through mixed conditions - rain/mud/snow/rocky terrain - and my feet stayed warm and dry, traction was excellent. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: bcmjr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best boots ever, keep my feet toasty on sub zero weather I work in.
customer_reviews.author: Jen pen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great shoes. very comfortable alittle wider through the toe area. just what I needed
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Kermes

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: Great boots! I have many co workers that own Keene boots, and now I know why. The best part is that when I got them delivered, I open ended the box, and found the higher end shaving cream I ordered a day after the boots. Thank you Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My EUROPE size 44, I bought keen11. 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: My EUROPE size 44, I bought keen11.5 - Fit as expected, in next time will buy 12 Мой размер СНГ 44, Keen 11.5 в самый раз в притык, можно смело брать на пол размера больше
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clasps don't break off like they do on other brands
customer_reviews.text: Clasps don't break off like they do on other brands. The inner soles are both loose now but these boots are a great value.
customer_reviews.author: GuardianMan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Snug fit. I need to wear thin socks but they'll break in over time and loosen up.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Chadwick

customer_reviews.title: I Don't like it.
customer_reviews.text: The top of the shoe doesn't fit as tightly as it should...Might as well be a low top shoe.
customer_reviews.author: gaerts18

customer_reviews.title: Amazon saves the day, again. Best customer service ever.
customer_reviews.text: Could have been a four but Keen blew me off when I called. Told me how they were changing their boots for a younger demographic. Boots were stiff, slippery in snow and one was sewn wrong. Columbia wp mids are better for me. Good luck Keen.
customer_reviews.author: waltackerman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my KEEN boots :-), very happy with them
customer_reviews.author: Fernando E.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boot, very comfortable and good fit
customer_reviews.text: Awesome boot, very comfortable and good fit. Only complaint would be the tongue is too big but it's not a big deal
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice boot. I went up a half size and they fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Slybry

customer_reviews.title: don`t buy
customer_reviews.text: these shoes are crap my right shoe had a bulge in it by the toes and after wearing these shoes I hurt my foot.
customer_reviews.author: JOSEPH A TORTORA

customer_reviews.title: poor design.
customer_reviews.text: One Flaw and I am attempting to fix it myself. If unable to fix it I will be returning the boots to Amazon. When lacing the boots there is a single eyelet (second from the top) on each side that is made out of fabric. After lacing the boots and pulling the laces tight the fabric eyelet broke away from the boot. The fabric is routed thru the side of the boot and looks to be glued in place. This broke away when tightening the laces....poor design...
customer_reviews.author: R. Keith Erdman

customer_reviews.title: It feels good to just use a whole goes beyond just not ...
customer_reviews.text: Getting the product was a bit of a side product in the sense sole confirm the results. It feels good to just use a whole goes beyond just not gonna be easy like a return to international buyers is not very good. Next, I had to pick carefully the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: KEEN mens Koven Polar-M Koven Polar-m
product_meta.description: Enjoy ever winter adventure, whether it is snowshoeing, winter hikes, or trips up and down the sled hill, when you wear the Keen® Koven Polar boot. Leather and textile upper. KEEN.Dry™ is a proprietary waterproof, breathable membrane that lets vapor out. 200g KEEN.Warm™ lightweight anti-microbial insulation to keep you warm. Traditional lace-up design with metal eyelets for a secure fit. Gator ring hook. Fleece lining for extra warmth and drier foot environment. Removable thermal heat shield footbed. Compression-molded EVA midsole offer shock-absorption and padding for all-day comfort. TPU stability shank with a shellback heel support. KEEN Patented Toe Protection wraps up and over the toes for ultimate protection. Nonmarking rubber outsole with dual compound snow and ice technology so the sole holds its ground. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 1 lb 1 oz Product measurements were taken using size 10, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
feature_bullets: Lace-up hiking boot featuring rubberized toe guard and looped pulls at tongue and collar
Fleece lining for warmth and comfort
